## ReadTableOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReadTableOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoMax?](./tables.readtableoptions.automax.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> If autoType is true, we'll limit the rows we check to this number to avoid scanning the entire table. This is ignored if a codebook is supplied. |
|  [autoType?](./tables.readtableoptions.autotype.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If true, we'll try to auto-detect the type of each column. This is ignored if a codebook is supplied. |
|  [codebook?](./tables.readtableoptions.codebook.md) |  | CodebookSchema | <i>(Optional)</i> If a codebook is supplied, we'll use this for type casting. |
